item.title: ZOmg the punishmenter
item.dc:creator: @hs_millions hs_millions
item.description:
@hs_millions wrote:

Omg i was bored here is my punishmentor…
You can know punish your computer

[code]/*
By hs_millions
This app will read a sentence X times in the cmd.
It will stop after X times or after 1 minut

This is for learning only… Not to be used to fuck pcs up… ( it cant do that unless you use it on a DOS computer) lol
*/

import java.util.*; // import java classes used in this.

public class Gentagelse { // declare the name of the file

public static void main(String args[]) { // the main void.. Will run this when you start the app

	System.out.println("Started APP"); // posting a message in the cmd
	String sentence = "Im stupid I promise that I will never do it again."; // the message to post X times
			int times = 500000; // how many times to write in cmd
			int counter = 0; // sets the counter variable.. this will count how many times it gonna write the above message
			Calendar start = Calendar.getInstance(); // loading
			int startMinut = start.get(Calendar.MINUTE); // sets the minut
			int startSekund = start.get(Calendar.SECOND); //sec
			start.roll(Calendar.MINUTE, true); // start the clock function
			int naesteMinut = start.get(Calendar.MINUTE);
			int naesteSekund = start.get(Calendar.SECOND);

			while (counter < times)  { // it will do whats inside the brackets till counter < times
			System.out.println(sentence); // prints the string
			GregorianCalendar now = new GregorianCalendar();
			if	(now.get(Calendar.MINUTE) >= naesteMinut)
			if	(now.get(Calendar.SECOND) >= naesteSekund)

			break;

			counter++; // adds one to counter
			}
			System.out.println("\n Wrote " + counter + " sentences on the black board!!");
			System.out.println("Must be enough punishment for today");

}

}

[/code]
